title: EPIC SIEGE OF HELGEN - Elder Scrolls: Total War - Stormcloaks Campaign #2
description:
EPIC SIEGE OF HELGEN - Elder Scrolls: Total War - Stormcloaks Campaign #2 - After a great start we will soon face the wrath of the Empire. Now that Helgen is under our control we can use it as a great military fort.  But will the great armies of the Empire attack us? If they do will we be able to hold? Enjoy the video :D

Mod link: http://www.moddb.com/mods/the-elder-scrolls-total-war

Unofficial Patch: http://www.twcenter.net/forums/showthread.php?750685-Sub-mod-Unofficial-TES-Patch-1-3-DOWNLOAD-LINK

JOIN MY DISCORD SERVER: https://discord.gg/JjR7UR3

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
